import{ALLMOVIES}from"../type/tpye";// 2- create reducer
const initialvalue={name:'',movies:[],pageCount:0};export const moviesReduser=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialvalue;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ALLMOVIES:return{movies:action.data,pageCount:action.pages,ditals:action.ditalsMovie};default:return state;}};
